articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA successfully tests SLS rocket that will help Artemis astronauts reach the moon - CNN
articles.description: The Space Launch System rocket that will launch NASA's Artemis astronauts into space on their way to the moon went through a final and successful hot-fire test of the core stage on Thursday.

articles.title: Hubble Sees Changing Seasons on Saturn - NASA
articles.description: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope is giving astronomers a view of changes in Saturn’s vast and turbulent atmosphere as the planet’s northern hemisphere summer transitions to fall in this series of images taken in 2018, 2019, and 2020 (left to right).
